description:
Emilia tried to warn the villagers of Arlam that danger was coming and they should evacuate, but was not well-received. As she`s pondering what more she can do, Wilhelm arrives at the mansion with a message...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der selbsternannte Ritter und der hervorragende Ritter
Jijou Kishi to Saiyuu no Kishi
Le chevalier autoproclamé et le chevalier modèle
O Cavaleiro Autoproclamado e o Cavaleiro da Piedade
The Self-Proclaimed Knight and the Greatest Knight
自称騎士と最優の騎士
